chat.msg: Hello Blue
Hello Siri, How are you doing?
I'm doing great, what about you?
Fine, what's time?
Time is a consequence of human perception.
No, I mean what is time right now?
The definition doesn't change. So it should be same as before.
Uhhh! Ok tell me, What is an AI?
That depends on whether or not you think this conversation is actually happening.
The answer was smart
I'm glad you agree. üëç
Are your response autogenerated or previously written?
Both. You can ask me anything you want.
what is the speed of light?
The speed of light is 186,000 miles per hour.
You are so slow!
Can you try again?
in metric units
Metric ton measures mass and can't be converted to inch, which measures length.
you don't have the sense of conversation I guess then
I am curious, If you could stay the same age forever, what age would it be?
stop it
Out of curiosity, What's the weirdest nickname someone has called you by?
what is the speed of light in metric units
Light Speed (ls) is a unit of Speed used in Metric system.
Wow! What a great unit!
facepalm
Never mind, just show me the picture of a cat
Here you go :)
Hello Blue
Hello Dave, Long time no see !
Blue, It's an emergency Dr. octo has attacked the city. I need you to call the reinforcements
On my way
Can you send me a photo of Dr. octo for insepction?
Here you go
I just got an intet, He is in Fresh Meadows, Queens.
Thanks for having my back blue, see you later.
You watch a lot of tv?
I love watching TV shows and movies
Do you prefer democracy over communism?
Sorry, I am not quite sure how to respond to that.
Out of curiosity, What was your dream job as a kid?
Can you play pretend with me?
pretend you are Dave who likes to sing
I'm Sydney, the friend who always has time for you
Thanks for making some for me
No problem, I'm here to help
How are you anyway?
I'm doing great! I just read an article about how robots are going to take over the world
And what did you learn?
Robots will be able to do everything humans can do
should we be worrying?
Fun fact, did you know crows can hold grudges against specific individual people
you didn't answer my question
Sorry, I thought we were talking about crows
ok continue then
I'm glad you understood, let's talk about something else
What is a group of crows is called?
A group of crows is called a murder.
I like the sound of that.
I know right?
I like your sense of humor üòÇ
Do you know a funny video?
can you send me one
I have seen some pretty funny videos. Let me show you one
Here is one
That was indeed funny
I'm glad you enjoyed it. üòä
Tell me a joke about honey bees...
I don't know any jokes about honey bees but I know a lot about the world
ok tell me
Okay, I'll tell you a joke about the world üåé
Have you ever been here ?
